doc.after: Homeostasis is the ability of an open system to regulate its internal environment to maintain stable conditions by means of multiple dynamic equilibrium adjustments controlled by interrelated regulation mechanisms All living organisms whether unicellular or multicellular exhibit homeostasis 34
